title: Discord Nitro
description: GET 1 MONTH OF DISCORD NITRO ON US, free for new and returning Nitro users. Offer ends June 7, 2023 at 11am EDT. Unleash more fun on Discord with HD streaming, custom emojis, profile styling, and oh so much more.
longDescription:
With Nitro, you’ll enjoy awesome perks that make gaming and hanging out on Discord as fun as ever! Level up the fun with game-changing perks like HD streaming, 500MB file uploads, and new Nitro releases like stylish Avatar Decorations, animated Super Reactions, and custom color Themes for your Discord app. 

Limited time offer. Subscription auto-renews for $9.99/month unless canceled. Terms apply. See [Discord Nitro](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/6225095156375) for details.

# Here are some perks you get to enjoy as a Nitro member:
- NEW Nitro releases: Access to the newest Avatar Decorations, animated Super Reactions, and 16 unique Theme colors for your Discord app
- Upload files up to 500 MB to share videos, photos, and more with ease 
- HD Streaming: Share your screen and gameplay in crisp, high resolution
- Custom emojis - collect ‘em, make your own, and use ‘em anywhere
- Bring your vibe and personality to Discord with your own animated avatar, banner image, profile theme, and Avatar Decorations
- 2 Boosts + 30% off extra Boosts: Get 2 Server Boosts to bless your favorite servers
